verses.verse: Ahaz <S%H271><s%> was twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> when he began to reign <S%H4427><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, and he reigned <S%H4427><s%> <S%H8804><s%> sixteen <S%H8337><s%> <S%H6240><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> in Yerushalayim <S%H3389><s%>: but he did <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> not that which was right <S%H3477><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>, like David <S%H1732><s%> his father <S%H1><s%>:

For he walked in <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the ways <S%H1870><s%> of the kings <S%H4428><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, and made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> also molten images <S%H4541><s%> for Baalim <S%H1168><s%>.

Moreover he burnt incense <S%H6999><s%> <S%H8689><s%> in the valley <S%H1516><s%> of the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hinnom <S%H2011><s%>, and burnt <S%H1197><s%> <S%H8686><s%> his children <S%H1121><s%> in the fire <S%H784><s%>, after the abominations <S%H8441><s%> of the heathen <S%H1471><s%> whom the YY <S%H3068><s%> had cast out <S%H3423><s%> <S%H8689><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>.

He sacrificed <S%H2076><s%> <S%H8762><s%> also and burnt incense <S%H6999><s%> <S%H8762><s%> in the high places <S%H1116><s%>, and on the hills <S%H1389><s%>, and under every green <S%H7488><s%> tree <S%H6086><s%>.

Wherefore the YY <S%H3068><s%> his 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> delivered <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> him into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the king <S%H4428><s%> of Syria <S%H758><s%>; and they smote <S%H5221><s%> <S%H8686><s%> him, and carried away <S%H7617><s%> <S%H8799><s%> a great multitude <S%H1419><s%> of them captives <S%H7633><s%>, and brought <S%H935><s%> <S%H8686><s%> them to Damascus <S%H1834><s%>. And he was also delivered <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8737><s%> into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the king <S%H4428><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, who smote <S%H5221><s%> <S%H8686><s%> him with a great <S%H1419><s%> slaughter <S%H4347><s%>.

For Pekah <S%H6492><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Remaliah <S%H7425><s%> slew <S%H2026><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%> an hundred <S%H3967><s%> and twenty <S%H6242><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> in one <S%H259><s%> day <S%H3117><s%>, which were all valiant <S%H2428><s%> men <S%H1121><s%>; because they had forsaken <S%H5800><s%> <S%H8800><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> of their fathers <S%H1><s%>.

And Zichri <S%H2147><s%>, a mighty man <S%H1368><s%> of Efrayim <S%H669><s%>, slew <S%H2026><s%> <S%H8799><s%> Maaseiah <S%H4641><s%> the king's <S%H4428><s%> son <S%H1121><s%>, and Azrikam <S%H5840><s%> the governor <S%H5057><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%>, and Elkanah <S%H511><s%> that was next <S%H4932><s%> to the king <S%H4428><s%>.

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> carried away captive <S%H7617><s%> <S%H8799><s%> of their brethren <S%H251><s%> two hundred <S%H3967><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%>, women <S%H802><s%>, sons <S%H1121><s%>, and daughters <S%H1323><s%>, and took also away <S%H962><s%> <S%H8804><s%> much <S%H7227><s%> spoil <S%H7998><s%> from them, and brought <S%H935><s%> <S%H8686><s%> the spoil <S%H7998><s%> to SHomron <S%H8111><s%>.

But a prophet <S%H5030><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> was there, whose name <S%H8034><s%> was Oded <S%H5752><s%>: and he went out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8799><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the host <S%H6635><s%> that came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8802><s%> to SHomron <S%H8111><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto them, Behold, because the YY <S%H3068><s%> 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> of your fathers <S%H1><s%> was wroth <S%H2534><s%> with Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%>, he hath delivered <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> them into your hand <S%H3027><s%>, and ye have slain <S%H2026><s%> <S%H8799><s%> them in a rage <S%H2197><s%> that reacheth up <S%H5060><s%> <S%H8689><s%> unto heaven <S%H8064><s%>.

And now ye purpose <S%H559><s%> <S%H8802><s%> to keep under <S%H3533><s%> <S%H8800><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%> and Yerushalayim <S%H3389><s%> for bondmen <S%H5650><s%> and bondwomen <S%H8198><s%> unto you: but are there not with you, even <S%H7535><s%> with you, sins <S%H819><s%> against the YY <S%H3068><s%> your 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> ?

Now hear <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8798><s%> me therefore, and deliver <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8685><s%> the captives <S%H7633><s%> again, which ye have taken captive <S%H7617><s%> <S%H8804><s%> of your brethren <S%H251><s%>: for the fierce <S%H2740><s%> wrath <S%H639><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> is upon you.

Then certain <S%H582><s%> of the heads <S%H7218><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Efrayim <S%H669><s%>, Azariah <S%H5838><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Johanan <S%H3076><s%>, Berechiah <S%H1296><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Meshillemoth <S%H4919><s%>, and Jehizkiah <S%H3169><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Shallum <S%H7967><s%>, and Amasa <S%H6021><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hadlai <S%H2311><s%>, stood up <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8799><s%> against them that came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8802><s%> from the war <S%H6635><s%>,

And said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto them, Ye shall not bring in <S%H935><s%> <S%H8686><s%> the captives <S%H7633><s%> hither: for whereas we have offended <S%H819><s%> against the YY <S%H3068><s%> already, ye intend <S%H559><s%> <S%H8802><s%> to add <S%H3254><s%> <S%H8687><s%> more to our sins <S%H2403><s%> and to our trespass <S%H819><s%>: for our trespass <S%H819><s%> is great <S%H7227><s%>, and there is fierce <S%H2740><s%> wrath <S%H639><s%> against Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>.

So the armed men <S%H2502><s%> <S%H8803><s%> left <S%H5800><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the captives <S%H7633><s%> and the spoil <S%H961><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the princes <S%H8269><s%> and all the congregation <S%H6951><s%>.

And the men <S%H582><s%> which were expressed <S%H5344><s%> <S%H8738><s%> by name <S%H8034><s%> rose up <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and took <S%H2388><s%> <S%H8686><s%> the captives <S%H7633><s%>, and with the spoil <S%H7998><s%> clothed <S%H3847><s%> <S%H8689><s%> all that were naked <S%H4636><s%> among them, and arrayed <S%H3847><s%> <S%H8686><s%> them, and shod <S%H5274><s%> <S%H8686><s%> them, and gave them to eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H8686><s%> and to drink <S%H8248><s%> <S%H8686><s%>, and anointed <S%H5480><s%> <S%H8799><s%> them, and carried <S%H5095><s%> <S%H8762><s%> all the feeble <S%H3782><s%> <S%H8802><s%> of them upon asses <S%H2543><s%>, and brought <S%H935><s%> <S%H8686><s%> them to Yericho <S%H3405><s%>, the city <S%H5892><s%> of palm trees <S%H8558><s%> <S%H8677><s%> <S%H5899><s%>, to <S%H681><s%> their brethren <S%H251><s%>: then they returned <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to SHomron <S%H8111><s%>.
At that time <S%H6256><s%> did king <S%H4428><s%> Ahaz <S%H271><s%> send <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto the kings <S%H4428><s%> of Ashur <S%H804><s%> to help <S%H5826><s%> <S%H8800><s%> him.

For again the Edomites <S%H130><s%> had come <S%H935><s%> <S%H8804><s%> and smitten <S%H5221><s%> <S%H8686><s%> Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%>, and carried away <S%H7617><s%> <S%H8799><s%> captives <S%H7628><s%>.

For the YY <S%H3068><s%> brought <S%H3665><s%> Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%> low <S%H3665><s%> <S%H8689><s%> because of Ahaz <S%H271><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>; for he made <S%H6544><s%> Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%> naked <S%H6544><s%> <S%H8689><s%>, and transgressed <S%H4603><s%> <S%H8800><s%> sore <S%H4604><s%> against the YY <S%H3068><s%>.

For Ahaz <S%H271><s%> took away a portion <S%H2505><s%> <S%H8804><s%> out of the house <S%H1004><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>, and out of the house <S%H1004><s%> of the king <S%H4428><s%>, and of the princes <S%H8269><s%>, and gave <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> it unto the king <S%H4428><s%> of Ashur <S%H804><s%>: but he helped <S%H5833><s%> him not.

And in the time <S%H6256><s%> of his distress <S%H6887><s%> <S%H8687><s%> did he trespass <S%H4603><s%> <S%H8800><s%> yet more <S%H3254><s%> <S%H8686><s%> against the YY <S%H3068><s%>: this is that king <S%H4428><s%> Ahaz <S%H271><s%>.

And in every several city <S%H5892><s%> of Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%> he made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> high places <S%H1116><s%> to burn incense <S%H6999><s%> <S%H8763><s%> unto other <S%H312><s%> 'elohim <S%H430><s%>, and provoked to anger <S%H3707><s%> <S%H8686><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> of his fathers <S%H1><s%>.
